name: CdmStudyFamily
title: Shared Data Model for Study Family
description: The **Shared Data Model for Study Family**

element.short: Shared Data Model for Study Family

element.short: Unique study family identifier. System identifier used for internal references.
element.definition: Unique study family identifier. System identifier used for internal references.

element.short: Study family identifier. System identifier used for external references.
element.definition: Study family identifier. System identifier used for external references.

element.short: Describes the 'type' of study family, eg, trio.
element.definition: Describes the 'type' of study family, eg, trio.

element.short: Free text describing the study family, such as potential inheritance or details about consanguinity
element.definition: Free text describing the study family, such as potential inheritance or details about consanguinity

element.short: Is there known or suspected consanguinity in this study family?
element.definition: Is there known or suspected consanguinity in this study family?

element.short: What is this study family investigating? EG, a specific condition
